بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
أقر ثابت بن دنيّن الحاكمي من بني رفع روح المقيم يومئذ بالنّاحية
المعروفة ببلجسوق من أعمال الفيّوم عند شهود هذا الكتاب
وأشهدهم على نفسه طوعا في صحّة بدنه منه وجواز أمر غير مكره ولا مجبر
ولا مضطهد ولا بجاهل بما أقر به فيه أن عليه وعنده وقبله وفي ذمّته
وخالص ماله دينا ثابتا وحقّا لارما له مپه وعرڤه به وپحڤڤه للمكپى
بأبو العلا بن برقوق المزارع بالنّاحية المعروفة بعلها بقلها من القمح الطّيّب النّاقي التّامّ
النّقي أربعة أرادب بالكيل المرزّأ الدّوّار النّصف من ذلك إردبّين يقوم له بجملة ذلك
في صفر صيفة من سنة ست وعشرين وخمس مائة أو إلى من يقوم مقامه ممّن يحضر إليه هذه
الحجّة بغير مدافعة ولا ممانعة ولا احتجاج بحجّة ولا اعتلال بعلّة عن غير الخروج له
من ما يلزمه على تمامه وكماله حتّى لا يبقى منه شي مل قلّ ولا جل جلّ وبجميعه أشهد على نفسه
في ربيع الأوّل من سنة سبع وعشرين وخمس مائة شهد يوسف بن عيسى بن صالح بن محمّد على
شهد عيسى بن صالح پن محمّد بن سعد بن صح ø

Au nom de Dieu clément et miséricordieux! In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
Ṯābit b. Dunain al-Ḥâkimî, numbering among the Banû Rafaʿ, residing at this time in the borough Ṯābit Ibn Dunayn al-Ḥākimī, appartenant aux Banū Rafuʿ et habitant en ce moment-là dans la localité
connue sous le nom de Bulǧušuq qui dépend des districts d’al-Fayyūm, a reconnu, en présence des témoins de ce document, known as Bulǧusûq, belonging to the district of al-Fayyûm, has acknowledged in the presence of the witnesses to this document
and has called them to witness to his obligation voluntarily, being in soundness of body and capacity of transacting business, without compulsion and not against his will et les a pris à témoins, de bon gré, étant dans la plénitude de sa faculté physique et sa capacité juridique, non contraint, ni forcé,
and not under constraint, and not ignorant of what he has acknowledged herein, viz. that he owes, has in his possession, is in debt and under obligation for, ni maltraité, ni ignorant de ce qu’il y a reconnnu, qu’il a à son débit comme dette, sous sa protection
et de son bien intégral, une dette valide et une obligation qui l’engage et qu’il connaît et considère comme véridique, envers le surnommé with his undiminished property, as an obligatory debt and an obligation incumbent upon him, binding him by this (acknowledgment), of which he is cognizant and certain, to the surnamed
Abuʾl-ʿAlâ b. Barqûq, the farmer in the borough known as ʿAlhâ (?) of good, pure, clean Abū l-ʿAlā Ibn Barqūq, le paysans dans la localité connue sous (le nom de) ʿAlhā, comme blé bon, propre
et nettoyé, quatre ardebs selon la mesure ample, dont la moitié est de deux ardebs. Il lui livrera cela entièrement wheat four artabas according to the ........... measure - the half thereof being two artabas. He will deliver all this
(au mois) de ṣafar de l’année cinq cent vingt-six, ou à celui qui le sipplée en lui présentant ce in Ṣafar of the year five hundred and twenty six to him or to whoever should stand in his stead presenting
document d’obliggation, sans chercher d’ajournement, ni de prétexte de refus, ni d’invocation d’aucun argument, ni de raison quelconque pour ne pas lui payer this voucher, without any delay, or pretext for refusal, or by bringing forward any argument or plea instead of paying him
ce que lui incombe entièrement et complètement, de telle manière qu’il n’en reste rien de repoussé, ni beaucoup ni peu. Il prit à témoin what is incumbent upon him completely and fully, so that there does not remain thereof anything much or little, and he has called witnesses to testify to his obligation respecting it all
en rabīʿ I de l’année cinq cent-vingt-sept: A témoigné Yūsuf Ibn ʿĪsā Ibn Ṣāliḥ Ibn Muḥammad de – juste – in Rabîʿ I of the year five hundred and twenty seven. Yûsuf b. ʿÎsâ b. Ṣâliḥ b. Muḥammad is witness to

la reconnaissance de celui qui a reconnu son contenu, et il écrivit en sa date. the acknowledgment by the acknowledger respecting that which (is contained) herein and he has written (it) on its date.
al-Ḫaṭīb de la reconnaissance de celui qui a reconnu son contenu [...], al-Ḫaṭîb is witness to the acknowledgment by the acknowledger respecting that which (is contained) herein ......
and he has written (it) on its date. Valid. et il écrivit à sa date.
